_sText:
I could not help my self with making this. I had too many ideas that I did not want to lose. After this map I will be taking a bit of a break hopefully. I worked quite a bit harder on this one, and added more textures. This is only my second map, so it might not be put together that well. 

I also would like to know if this was an improvement from my first map. Or if I completely went down hill. Enjoy the map!

NOTE: Pink and black textures packed properly. Download fixed.
